```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
SciViews::R
```
# importation de données
```{r}
(biometry2 <- read_csv("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQoVtSWbENWzxbALxD0qyNDqxV4uSYqzLCtJgcNGE7ciT6nkWOjA9b6dMBHaSUY8Nw5f-mSpUEeN-3S/pub?output=csv", locale =  locale(decimal_mark= ",")))

```

```{r}
biometry2 %>.%
  filter(., taille != "NA" ) -> test2
```
#correction variables facteurs-numérique
```{r}
test2$acti_physique <- as.numeric(test2$acti_physique) 
```
```{r}
test2$alcool <- as.numeric(test2$alcool)
```

```{r}
test2$grignotage <- as.numeric(test2$grignotage)
```

```{r}
test2$fastfood <- as.numeric(test2$fastfood)
```

#graphique
```{r}
chart(test2, taille~masse %col=% genre)+
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
chart(test2, ~tour_taille )+
  geom_histogram(bins= 30, na.rm = TRUE)
```

#importation rds 
```{r}
write(biometry2, file ="/biometry2.rds", type = "rds", compress= "xz")
```
